name: Balancing Acts
description:
A short, silly game about balance throughout transmasc transition.

CW: The second stage has a pixel-art visual of a syringe. The syringe simply tilts back and forth and does not puncture skin.

Created for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023. Check out the devlog post below for reflections on the jam and a writeup of my experience making the game and developing in Unity for the first time.
